song.englishname: Thank You For The Blood - Matt Redman

english.segment1: Thank you, thank you for the blood that you shed. Stansing in its blessing we sing these freedom songs. Thank you thank you for the battle you won. Standing in your victory we sing salvation songs. We sing salvations song
english.segment2: You have opened a way to the father. Where before we could never have come. Jesus count us as yours now forever. As we sing these freedom songs
english.segment3: We sing of all you've done. We sing of all you've done. We sing of all you've done for us. Won for us, paid for us
